subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Knicks, who started the season as the oldest team in  N.B.A. history, just got older, by adding the 35-year-old forward Kenyon Martin. Here are some players the Knicks could have added who go way back.
snippet: The Knicks, who started the season as the oldest team in  N.B.A. history, just got older, by adding the 35-year-old forward Kenyon Martin. Here are some players the Knicks could have added who go way back.
